images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of the paper, detailing Instance, Cluster, Emerging Scenarios, and Miscellaneous Areas.𝐑𝐑\mathbf{R}bold_Rrepresents a request. In Inter-request scheduling, two requests,𝐑𝟏𝐑𝟏\mathbf{R1}bold_R1(10 toks) and𝐑𝟐𝐑𝟐\mathbf{R2}bold_R2(2 toks), arrive simultaneously. Ignoring the prefill process, if𝐑𝟏𝐑𝟏\mathbf{R1}bold_R1is processed first, its generation rate is 1 tok/s, and𝐑𝟐𝐑𝟐\mathbf{R2}bold_R2’s rate is 0.2 tok/s. Reversing the order gives𝐑𝟐𝐑𝟐\mathbf{R2}bold_R2a rate of 1 tok/s and𝐑𝟏𝐑𝟏\mathbf{R1}bold_R10.9 tok/s. The default decoding speed is 1 token/s.
